response.homeDescription: Tuscany Villa located in the Bella Fiore Gated area of Lake Las Vegas! This beautiful 4,000 sq.ft. estate has been newly remodeled and features over $100K worth of upgrades, including huge premium pool size lot that with mountain and city sky line views. Gourmet kitchen with granite counter-tops and island. This home also features 2 master suites one upstairs and down, upstairs game room with wet bar, great room with fire place, office and much much more. Paverstone patio, porch, courtyard and driveway and more. Call me today to see this beautiful home. http://freshstarthousingprogram.org/laubry/
response.whatOwnerLoves: Lake Las Vegas community resort destination situated on a privately owned 320 acre lake that features 10 miles of shoreline and offers great escapes for fishing, sailing, and swimming. Within the 3,592 are master planned resort are exquisite residential estates and condominiums , 2 challenging golf courses, three world class hotels, and 50 acres of open space with hiking and biking trails. The Mediterranean inspired resort includes pampering spas, a full-service marina with watercraft rentals and yacht cruises, and MonteLago Village a retail enclave at the center of the resort. The village offers restaurants and cafes, art galleries and quaint boutiques. Lake Las Vegas Resort is located in Henderson, Nevada, just 17 miles east of the Las Vegas Strip and adjacent to Lake Mead National Recreation Area. Lake Las Vegas Resort residential homes sites include custom/estate with panoramic views of the lake, golf courses, open space, and surrounding mountains and city lights.
